play.description: Starts playing the first result of the query or link

playnext.description: Starts playing the query or link after the current song has finished

playnow.description: Stops playing the current song and starts playing the query or link

shuffle.description: Randomly shuffles the remaining songs in the queue

volume.description: Sets the volume to [v]% (must be between 0% and 200%)

stop.description: Stops the currently playing song, clears the queue, and disconnects from voice

destroy.description: Stops and removes the music player

front.description: Moves the music player to the front of the channel the command was sent from

About: Music plays videos and playlists from YouTube, and music files stored on the internet.
